DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess if the combination of sunitinib and pemetrexed is tolerable when coadministered at each recommended dose/schedule.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study Of Sunitinib In Combination With Pemetrexed In Patients With Advanced Solid Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Patients with a diagnosis of a solid malignancy that is refractory to standard therapy or for which no standard therapy exists. Patients has a good performance status (ECOG 0 or 1) Prior treatment with either pemetrexed or SU011248. Coughing up blood within 4 weeks before starting study treatment (small amounts okey). Hypertension that cannot be controlled by medications.
